about_the_game:
Oblitus mortis

I present to you a game that you won't want to miss. A 2D pixel art metroidvania, full of adventures and inspired by the fascinating legends and myths of Venezuela. Enter a mysterious world where you will be the one to help this little Ghost solve the mystery of why all these creatures and souls in torment are wandering the earth.

Find new and different weapons, unlock skills with each enemy you defeat, use different hats and masks to improve those skills.

Face mythological creatures, discover secrets about these beings of which many stories have been told in the fields and places, explore this entire interconnected world and enjoy a game in the purest style of the Castlevania classics, with a small and adorable twist.

Immerse yourself in a dark world inspired by the legends and myths of Venezuela. With pixel art graphics, this game will take you to explore the most mysterious and dangerous corners of this land.

In Oblitus Mortis, you will face legendary creatures such as the Weeping Woman, whose wail haunts the forests, Dr. Knoche and his mummies, and Galipán the Axeman. Every enemy, every area, every Object is steeped in our history and mythology.

short_description: Embark on an epic 2D adventure with this pixel art style game, a metroidvania set in a world full of legends and myths of Venezuela. Explore various scenarios, face mythical creatures and discover ancient secrets in this incredible odyssey.
